Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to establishing a study regarding homeless women who are veterans in the state of New York
Summary: Relates to establishing a study regarding homeless women who are veterans in the state of New York; a report on the findings shall be provided no later than June 30th, 2020 and made publicly available and posted on the division of veterans affairs website.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the performance of a study regarding homeless women who are veterans in the state of New York
